reviews.text: Superior rooms were pleasant and spacious. We had an interesting dressing area located in a tower! Bathrooms has been recently refurbished. Location really good between beach and town centre. Friendly and helpful reception staff. Car parking limited.
reviews.title: Good location

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Stayed a couple of days on a group trip. Perfectly reasonable hotel overlooking the sea, free WiFi which worked well in the room but not in the restaurant area. Food was fine for the evening meals and one of the better breakfasts in French hotels. Room was large and clean overlooking the courtyard at the back with a good sized bathroom, town centre is a short 1 minute walk away. Limited parking.
reviews.title: Pretty good, well located
Adequate
reviews.text: The hotel was adequate, not the usual standard we expect of a Logis. We did not take breakfast as €11.50 seemed very expensive for a seaside hotel. The menu for evening meal was very restrictive, and expensive, although the waitress did sort me out a steak which was off menu. The piped music reminded us of a funeral dirge, and certainly did not put us in a positive eating mood .... in fact we should have left and found one of the other plentiful restaurants in town

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Whilst past reviews of this hotel have generally been good there are a few criticisms about it needing a makeover, being a little shabby etc. Well that's been done as best I can see! Reception is clean, bright and very tidy. The lounge is well furnished, looks like new and is spotless. There is free WiFi which gave a very strong signal in the room. Our room on the third floor had a superb bathroom, very comfortable bed with beautifully crisp ironed sheets and pillowcases. Everything was clinically clean. I really could not fault it.
reviews.title: Exceptional value

reviews.text: Breakfast at Euro 11.30 is also well worth the price. Great choice of breads, pastries, cold meats, cereals, fruit etc. One of the best French buffet breakfasts we've come across.
reviews.title: best place to stay for Dieppe Kite Festival
